name: Rocketship Rescue
description:
How to play
  • Use left and right arrow keys to move
  • Collect fuel
  • Avoid asteroids
  • Follow the indicator to find aliens to rescue
Game Features
  • Fluid control scheme which is easy to understand but hard to master
  • Dynamic difficulty based on player progress
  • Procedurally generated environment and alien characters for endless gameplay
  • Created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare #34, with the theme "two button controls"
Credits
  • Design, code, and art by Rose Abernathy
  • Music: Akiko by Arif_Banto from freesoundtrackmusic.com
